snippet.title: Vice: Magic City Mayhem Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Vice: Magic City Mayhem - A Zelda-like set in a chaotic GTA: Vice City-inspired world! Make your way through bustling nightclubs, scenic beaches, and raptor-infested yachts on a raunchy adventure to save the day!

Wishlist Vice: Magic City Mayhem on Steam today to stay updated and help us bring this retro adventure to life.  
👉  https://bit.ly/Wishlist-Vice-Magic-City-Mayhem

Follow us on Kickstarter!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/jurassicsunsetgames/vice-magic-city-mayhem-a-zelda-like-fused-with-gta-vibes?ref=bvifsz

Features:

• 2D hack-n-slash combat (with ranged elements)

• Epic and dynamic boss fights

• Exploration with environmental secrets

• Item and weapon upgrade system

• Unique dungeons with engaging puzzles

Follow us on social media!

FB - https://www.facebook.com/JurassicSunsetGames

IG - https://www.instagram.com/jurassicsunsetgames/

X/Twitter - https://x.com/JurassicSunset

Bluesky - https://bsky.app/profile/jurassicsunsetgames.com

#retrogames #indiegames #zeldalike #gamedev #indiedev #vicemagiccity
